meanings.sent1: They enjoy dueting together during music class.
meanings.sent2: The singers were dueting beautifully on stage.
meanings.sent3: The birds outside seem to be dueting in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: The two colors were dueting on the canvas, creating a stunning contrast.
meanings.sent5: The actors were dueting with such passion that the audience was moved to tears.

meanings.definition: The act of singing or performing a duet with someone else.
meanings.sent1: Their dueting brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent2: The dueting at the concert was a highlight of the evening.
meanings.sent3: The cats in the alley were dueting under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The dueting of the instruments filled the room with a magical sound.
meanings.sent5: The siblings' dueting was a tradition they cherished every year.
